features: SMOOTH SHAVE: Our GBS soft shave cream hydrates and creates a thin layer of protection so the blade can glide smoothly over the skin and cut through the hairs. It Prevents any nicks, cuts, and razor bumps and fights off irritation or redness

SANDALWOOD ESSENTIAL: G.B.S Sandalwood Shaving Cream for Men is made of quality ingredients, we are known to provide quality products at an affordable price, Sandalwood Shaving Cream also helps individuals to have a close comfortable shave. It is made of a unique formula that helps fight against nicks, irritation, razor and burn.

SANDALWOOD INGREDIENTS: Our GBS Sandalwood shave cream will nourish your skin and hair follicles. In Contains nutrients that infuse your skin with health and vitality, including aloe vera and communis oil to keep your skin youthful, soft, and feeling smooth. It’s scented with sandalwood oil for a warm, masculine aroma, reminiscent of the classic barbershop, allowing you to look, smell, and feel your best.

TRUSTED BRAND: Our GBS Sandalwood Shave Cream & all accessories are made by our trusted brand GBS. Thousands of people trust us, so you can be confident that when you shop with us, you'll be getting high-quality, creative goods designed to give you the greatest shave possible.
G.B.S Sandalwood Shave Cream stops redness, razor bumps, redness and irritation in its tracks

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing our G.B.S Sandalwood Scented Shave Cream!

Unleash the power of our G.B.S Sandalwood Scented Shaving Cream! A luxurious blend of Aloe, Chamomile Extract, and Lavender Extract meticulously crafted for an unparalleled shaving ritual. Say goodbye to razor burn, redness, and irritation and say hello to a smooth, indulgent shave that stands out from the rest!

Compare with the rest of our products Sandalwood Shaving Cream Add to Cart G.B.S After-Shave Balm Add to Cart G.B.S Citrus Beard Oil Add to Cart G.B.S Beard Growth Serum Add to Cart G.B.S Citrus Beard Balm Add to Cart Customer Reviews 3.9 out of 5 stars 22 4.0 out of 5 stars 142 3.6 out of 5 stars 26 4.4 out of 5 stars 14 — Price $6.99$6.99 $9.98$9.98 $9.98$9.98 $9.99$9.99 $9.99$9.99 Ready to use out of the Box ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Soothes and Nourishes Skin ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Sandalwood Scented! ✔ ✔ ✘ ✘ ✘ Citrus Scented ✘ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ Barber approved ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔

What sets our G.B.S Shaving Cream apart from the rest? Perfect for a smooth shave! With a smooth glide, the razor blade can get closer to the skin without causing damage or irritation ensuring a clean, closer shave! Eliminate Razor burn! Effective at preventing razor burn and irritation while ensuring a smooth and easy glide for your razor blade while leaving your skin soft and smooth! A Masculine Sandalwood Scent The scent of Sandalwood and moisturizing properties of Aloe Vera and Chamomile Extract reducing redness and leaving your skin feeling silky smooth Perfect Gift idea for Men! Want a practical gift idea for men that he will actually use and appreciate? Look no further! Makes a great Fathers Day gift or Stocking Stuffer too!

A Shaving cream specially formulated for any and all skin types! G.B.S Sandalwood Scented Shaving Cream's combination of Aloe Vera, Chamomile Extract, Lavender Extract, and its specially formulated razor glide properties work together harmoniously to provide you with a shaving experience that's not only enjoyable but also effective at preventing razor burn, redness, and irritation. Your razor will effortlessly glide over your skin, ensuring a smooth, comfortable shave every time you use it!

Create an ultra-slick surface so your blade can glide effortlessly over skin! G.B.S Sandalwood Scented Shaving Cream is exceptionally effective at preventing razor burn and irritation while ensuring a smooth and easy glide for your razor blade Minimizes Friction: The lubricated surface reduces friction between the razor blade and sensitive skin, preventing the blade from tugging or causing micro-cuts.Reduces Pressure: With smoother razor glide, less pressure is required during shaving, which is essential for preventing irritation on sensitive skin.Protective Barrier: The shaving cream creates a protective barrier, acting as a buffer between the sharp razor blade and the skin. This barrier helps shield sensitive skin from irritation and redness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rich, thick lather using very little cream
reviews.reviewText: Several years ago I decided that I was no longer going to use canned shaving cream after I read the label and realized that they use hydrocarbons as the propellant to get the cream out of the can. Since such hydrocarbons contribute to climate change, I decided to switch to shaving soaps with a shaving brush to help reduce my carbon footprint by that tiny bit. But the shaving soaps I was using, bars that fit into a shaving cup, didn't provide the thick, long lasting lather that I like when I'm shaving, so I was still trying to find a product that would both lather well and not use hydrocarbons.When I first opened this container, I was sure that it was not going to be the solution. The shaving cream is frothy and light, and I didn't think it would last very long, making the cost per shave too high to justify. However, I have found that only a tiny bit is all I need to get a thick lather that provides excellent lubrication and a very comfortable shave, even when I haven't shaved in several days. For me, just touching the tips of the bristles against the cream and giving the brush a little twist is usually all I need to do. That little bit of cream on the tips of the bristles will usually be more than enough for the shave, and I now expect this container to actually last longer than the solid bars I have been using, making it a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the sandalwood scent. It's not overpowering nor too sweet. Just perfect for my taste.The consistency its a bit odd, almost like a mousse. But it works just fine. Makes good lather with my brush, and it's slick enough that the blade glides smoothly. I get a good, irritation-free shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: I'm really happy with this shaving cream! It comes in a wonderful, classy little container and smells great. They tell you a small amount goes a long way, and it really does. I've been using a dab about the size of an almond, and that has still produced even coverage over my face. At that rate, the small jar is going to last a long time. The cream feels smooth and pleasant going on, and gives me a clean, refreshing shave. I'm very pleased with it, and I think it's a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works for me
reviews.reviewText: I use this for travel. Smells nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super creamy hydration shaving cream!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to give it a try and so far, I'm really happy with it. The shaving cream is really "creamy", feel great on screen and you can actually feel the hydration effect on it. I've been using shaving creams instead of shaving foams for a time now and to be honest, this one is one of the best ones I've tried. I believe the product is great value for money as I've had spent more money on bigger brand named products that didn't feel as good as this one. I would recommend it 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for a few days and I really like how it works. One note is a little goes a long ways. The shaving cream gives a very good lubricating surface and lets the razor glide across your face. I really like that it does not leave my face feeling oily like some of the others I have tried. The smell is pleasant without being over powering, I will definitely be switching to this brand.

reviews.reviewerName: salt of the earthsalt of the earth
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars feels like fluff, lubricates but no scent at all, thin on the face
reviews.reviewText: this comes in a jar and I assumed would come smelling like sandalwood as the title suggested, but when I opened it I did not notice any scent at all. The product itself is light and seems to have a whipped consistency to it. it goes on light and does not stand up well to moisture. You end up using more than one might think per shave and it is not especially good at preventing nicks and cuts as it does not cling well to my face. All in all I would not get this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick texture clean feel after
reviews.reviewText: I'm used to using the shaving creme and a can and thought at first well this is not much creme... but a little goes along way. I was able to completely shave with what would have covered a 1/5th of my face with the can creme. Nice thick creme although I think I will buy a brush to apply it moving forward I am sold on this style of creme now.
